Post.title: wxpromise
Post.author: T.2stt
Post._content:
>
wx.chooseImage(OBJECT),
wx.previewImage(OBJECT),
wx.getImageInfo(OBJECT),
wx.saveImageToPhotosAlbum(OBJECT), scope.writePhotosAlbum

## wx.chooseImage
	chooseImage+API
	wx.previewImage(OBJECT),

### 
``` bash
	wx.chooseImage({
	  count: 1, // 9
	  sizeType: ['original', 'compressed'], // 
	  sourceType: ['album', 'camera'], // 
	  success: function (res) {
	    // tempFilePathimgsrc
	    var tempFilePaths = res.tempFilePaths
	  }
	})
```

### OBJECT
|         |     |    |   |
| --------   | :-----:   | :----: | :----: |
| <font face="fantasy">count</font>      | Number      |       |   9    |
| <font face="fantasy">sizeType</font>   | StringArray |       |   original compressed     |
| <font face="fantasy">sourceType</font> | StringArray |       |   album camera     |
| <font face="fantasy">success</font>    | Function    |       |    tempFilePaths    |
| <font face="fantasy">fail</font>       | Function    |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">complete</font>   | Function    |       |       |


## wx.previewImage
	

### 
```bash
	wx.previewImage({
	  current: '', // http
	  urls: [] // http
	})
```
### OBJECT
|         |     |    |   |
| --------   | :-----:   | :----: | :----: |
| <font face="fantasy">current</font>      | String      |       |    urls     |
| <font face="fantasy">urls</font>   | StringArray |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">success</font>    | Function    |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">fail</font>       | Function    |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">complete</font>   | Function    |       |       |

## wx.getImageInfo
	

### 
```bash
	wx.getImageInfo({
	  src: 'images/a.jpg',
	  success: function (res) {
	    console.log(res.width)
	    console.log(res.height)
	  }
	})
	
	wx.chooseImage({
	  success: function (res) {
	    wx.getImageInfo({
	      src: res.tempFilePaths[0],
	      success: function (res) {
	        console.log(res.width)
	        console.log(res.height)
	      }
	    })
	  }
	})
```
### OBJECT
|         |     |    |   |
| --------   | :-----:   | :----: | :----: |
| <font face="fantasy">src</font>      | String      |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">success</font>    | Function    |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">fail</font>       | Function    |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">complete</font>   | Function    |       |       |

#### 
``` bash
1.success
  1.1 width----StringArra
  1.2 height----ObjectArray File 
4.File :
  4.1 path----Numberpx
  4.2 size----Numberpx
  4.3 path----String
  4.4 orientation----String
  4.5 type----String
```
#### orientation
|         |     |
| --------   | :-----:   |
| <font face="fantasy">up</font>            |       |
| <font face="fantasy">down</font>          | 180 |
| <font face="fantasy">left</font>          | 90 |
| <font face="fantasy">right</font>         | 90    |
| <font face="fantasy">up-mirrored</font>   | up    |
| <font face="fantasy">down-mirrored</font> | down    |
| <font face="fantasy">left-mirrored</font> | left    |
| <font face="fantasy">right-mirrored</font>| right    |

## wx.saveImageToPhotosAlbum
	 scope.writePhotosAlbum

### 
```bash
	wx.saveImageToPhotosAlbum({
	    success(res) {
	    }
	})
```
### OBJECT
|         |     |    |   |
| --------   | :-----:   | :----: | :----: |
| <font face="fantasy">filePath</font>      | String      |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">success</font>    | Function    |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">fail</font>       | Function    |       |       |
| <font face="fantasy">complete</font>   | Function    |       |       |

#### 
```bash
	1.success
		errMsg----String
```

>WXML
WXMLWeiXin Markup Language


## 
WXMLtemplate

### 
 name template
```bash
<!--
  index: int
  msg: string
  time: string
-->
<template name="msgItem">
  <view>
    <text> {{index}}: {{msg}} </text>
    <text> Time: {{time}} </text>
  </view>
</template>
```


### 
1.
```bash
<import src="../../utils/comment/noData/noData.wxml" />
```
2.wxss
```bash
wxss
@import src="../../utils/comment/noData/noData.wxss"
```

3. <font color="red">is</font>  data 
```bash
<template is="msgItem" data="{{...item}}"/>
Page({
  data: {
    item: {
      index: 0,
      msg: 'this is a template',
      time: '2016-09-15'
    }
  }
})
```
is  Mustache 
```bash
<template name="odd">
  <view> odd </view>
</template>
<template name="even">
  <view> even </view>
</template>

<block wx:for="{{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5]}}">
	<template is="{{item % 2 == 0 ? 'even' : 'odd'}}"/>
</block>
```

Post.title: wxpromise--for
Post.author: T.2stt
Post._content:
> wxpromisewx:for

## wx:for
 index item
````bash
<view wx:for="{{array}}">
  {{index}}: {{item.message}}
</view>

<!-- js -->
Page({
  data: {
    array: [{
      message: 'foo',
    }, {
      message: 'bar'
    }]
  }
})
```
---

### 
|         |     |
| --------   | :-----:   |
| wx:for-item   |  |
| wx:for-index   |  |

```bash
<view wx:for="{{array}}" wx:for-index="idx" wx:for-item="itemName">
  {{idx}}: {{itemName.message}}
</view>
```
---

### wx:for 
```bash
<view wx:for="{{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9]}}" wx:for-item="i">
  <view wx:for="{{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9]}}" wx:for-item="j">
    <view wx:if="{{i <= j}}">
      {{i}} * {{j}} = {{i * j}}
    </view>
  </view>
</view>
```
---

### block wx:for()
 block wx:if wx:for <block/>
```bash
<block wx:for="{{[1, 2, 3]}}">
  <view> {{index}}: </view>
  <view> {{item}} </view>
</block>
```
---

### wx:key

```bash

, wx:key 
 wx:key warning 
```

|   |     |
| --------   | :-----:   |
|   |  for  array  item  property property  |
|  *this  | for  item  item |

  {{item}}
</view>
```

  {{item}}
</view>
```

  {{item}}
</view>
```

  {{item}}
</view>
```
